name: SPLOOGE
description:
This is my entry to the BlackThornProd GameJam. It was a really fun experience and i hope you enjoy my game!

I tries to experiment with a new art style instead of pixel art and I think it turned out alright...

The theme to the jam was "less is more" and the idea that popped into my head was less SPEED is more PROJECTILES, (you need SPANIC SPEED). 

This was my very first GameJam so I would really appreciate any constructive criticism.
